title: Topic 001 Question 082
body: A company has two VPC networks named VPC A and VPC B. The VPC A CIDR block is 10.0.0.0/16 and the VPC B CIDR block is 172.31.0.0/16. The company wants to establish a VPC peering connection named pcx-12345 between both VPCs.
Which rules should appear in the route table of VPC A after configuration? (Choose two.)
